items.content_html: TaskBoard is a lightweight task management application built using the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express.js, React, Node.js). It allows users to create, update, and delete tasks, helping them stay organized and productive.

items.content_html: Dhwanify is a lightweight, open-source music player built with Electron and React. It offers a modern and intuitive user interface for local audio playback, music organization, and downloading capabilities. Dhwanify also features real-time audio visualization, making your music experience visually engaging.
items.title: titanite07/Dhwanify2.0: Dhwanify is a lightweight, open-source music player built with Electron and React. It offers a modern and intuitive user interface for local audio playback, music organization, and downloading capabilities. Dhwanify also features real-time audio visualization, making your music experience visually engaging.

items.content_html: Zeno is a zero-dependency, lightweight web framework for TypeScript, designed for maximum simplicity and flexibility. It provides intuitive file-based routing and makes building APIs and web applications straightforward while ensuring high performance.
items.title: zenokit/zeno: Zeno is a zero-dependency, lightweight web framework for TypeScript, designed for maximum simplicity and flexibility. It provides intuitive file-based routing and makes building APIs and web applications straightforward while ensuring high performance.

items.content_html: Threads Clone is a modern social networking mobile app built with NativeScript Angular, designed for real-time interactions, seamless user experience, and smooth animations. Users can create threads, engage with comments and likes, receive real-time notifications, and share media—all in a lightweight and native mobile experience. 🚀
items.title: iamkanishka/NativeThreads: Threads Clone is a modern social networking mobile app built with NativeScript Angular, designed for real-time interactions, seamless user experience, and smooth animations.
